```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
data <- read_csv("Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.csv")
```


```{r}
View(data)
```

```{r}
data %>%
  tail(10) %>%
  ggplot( aes(x='year', y='Rate per 100,000 population')) +
    geom_line( color="grey") +
    geom_point(shape=21, color="black", fill="#69b3a2", size=6) +
    theme_ipsum() +
    ggtitle("Evolution of bitcoin price")

data_bar_chart <- data %>% 
  group_by('Offence Division') %>%
  summarise(avg_rate = mean('Rate per 100,000 population'))

barplot(data$`Rate per 100,000 population`, names=data$`Offence Division`, 
        col="#69b3a2",
        horiz=T, las=1
        )
```
